title: Delicious Malicious Mordekaiser Christmas cookies
body:
http://pre05.deviantart.net/11ed/th/pre/i/2015/347/9/b/morde_cookies_by_nimrohd-d9k00y1.jpg

http://img14.deviantart.net/2c92/i/2015/347/0/5/morde_cookies_by_nimrohd-d9k00sj.jpg

Warning; May contain traces of Metal

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/b33193e3f6ee97c0825bbe2b86a80ac6.gif

replies.body:
So Mordekaiser can be a baker but Pantheon can't?!

{{item:3070}} {{champion:80}} {{item:3070}}

Oh shit, a joke of this type without the self insert Graves+cigar fuckup?!

_Instant upvote!_
But where is Graves cigar?
_TRIGGERED_

Who do you think helped Malicious Metal and Mordekaiser bake those cookies?

Pantheon and Morgana of course.

Those cookies are just full of suffering, sin, honor, and huekaiser gameplay balance.
Maybe he's like Jarvan and he's helping. ;)
These are so badass! Nicely done! ^-^

Thank you :D

They would have been way more metal if I had burned them but then again, I like me some delicious cookies.
I think we can leave the burnt cookies up to Morgana. ;)
You only need to bake them once, fool!

So does that mean we won't get Sinful Succulence Mordekaiser with gigantic oven mitts and a rolling pin as a mace?
T^T
what's even worse, is that Panth, who IS GIVING THE THUMB'S UP, wouldn't become a baker.
Holy, for all this time I thought it was a chicken.
I think it would be better if Riot focuses on actually fixing Mordey first as amazing as that skin sounds :D
I'm sure she tries her hardest.
Maybe she just needs a lesson from Pantheon. :P
Can I have a recepie?

-8 ounces of Metal shards 
-9 ounces of Pain
-1 pinch of Despair
-3 crushed skulls
-1 blackened soul
-18 ounces of Suffering
-1 Indomitable will

And lots of love
Thank you kindly, sir. Now, excuse me, but I have to go to the kitchen.
How many hues are needed, and what if I wanted to make the doritokaiser colors?

Not cooked enough
http://i.imgur.com/n1aOeTR.jpg
Saved
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CSfK203UAAAkwID.png

Whenever I see a Malicious Metal and LaughingFish thread these days, I can't help but wonder, "What the heck am I notable for?"

No, I'm not **envious** of you at all, Malicious. Not at all, nope...

You don't have to make threads to be "known". 

People here know me as that annoying guy that always talks about {{champion:103}}
Well, it's in your username and everythin', and I don't talk about my main like you or Malicious.
At least your probably not bronze...I'm to lazy to look you up XD
I love this so much I can't even describe it.

Hey, you might want to make some Vladimir themed delicacies yourself as a tributeXD

"Punomancer's pool of Pudding' "

Sadly, I am an appalling chef.

Being TheUntitledKing does not make me TheUntitledBaKing.
Happy Holidays Malicious. We all appreciate how vocal you are about Mordekaiser. Have a good one.

http://www.popularmechanics.com/space/deep-space/a11506/heavy-metal-rain-venus-17349212/

Because Metal.
Now I know where I'll spend my christmas holiday XD
_Somewhere, Ozzy Osbourne is saying, "I knew it!"_

New item for Mordekaiser confirmed.
{{item:2009}} Steel Biscuit of Rejuvenation.
these always remind me of poro snacks and how i wish you could get more in game XD
They aren't really mordekaiser cookies until CertainlyTneedstogo ruins them
Now I'm almost certain our dear Malicious Metal wears underwear with tiny Mordekaiser helmets on them.
Delicious Metal
Recipe?

The second picture clearly showed the recipe:
Hue hue hue hue hue hue hue hue hue...
Petition to change {{item:2009}} to those cookies.

Needs gray frosting. =b

What kind of cookies are they supposed to be?  Sugar cookies?
Malicious, I have a question for you. What triggered your love for Mordekaiser? What caused you to like him so much?

1/10 IGN

It's the best.
Looks like these cookies are a delicious source of iron.
it taste brutal AF
After 3 cookies does you stomach just inebriate itself like after 3 morde auto's?
Nicely done! Here take some {{item:2054}}.
You really do have no life
